# Anandalok Best Actor Award

Anandalok Puraskar or Anandalok Awards ( ) ceremony is one of the most prominent film events given for Bengali Cinemas in India. Anandalok, the only Bengali language film magazine, is published by Ananda Publishers; Ananda Bazar Patrika presents this award. The magazine was started on 25 January 1975 and the awards ceremony was started in 1998.
